snippet: An exhibition of 40 paintings and prints at the Rye Arts Center aims to enlighten gallerygoers about what abstract art is.
abstract: Exhibition From Where I Stand: 12 Contemporary Abstract Artists, consisting of 40 paintings and prints at the Rye Arts Center, aims to enlighten gallerygoers about what abstract art is (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: An exhibition of 40 paintings and prints at the Rye Arts Center aims to enlighten gallerygoers about what abstract art is.

headline.seo: Abstract Artists’ Works on View at the Rye Arts Center
headline.main: In This Show, the Abstract Is Here and Now
headline.print_headline: In This Show, the Abstract Is Here and Now
